mapper.select: SELECT else_id, else_image, else_type, else_price, else_details, else_statu, type_id FROM ielse WHERE else_id=#{elseId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ielse SET else_statu=0 WHERE else_id=#{elseId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ielse(else_id, else_image, else_type, else_price, else_details, else_statu, type_id) VALUE (#{ielse.elseId}, #{ielse.elseImage}, #{ielse.elseType}, #{ielse.elsePrice}, #{ielse.elseDetails}, #{ielse.elseStatu}, #{ielse.typeId})
